hero.title: Free Development & Productivity Tools
hero.subtitle: Professional tools suite that run 100% in your browser. Maximum privacy, zero server costs, no limits.

features.description: Our tools run completely client-side using modern browser APIs. This means absolute privacy, instant load, and zero infrastructure costs.

ourTools.title: Our Tools
ourTools.subtitle: All processing happens in your browser. Your data never leaves your device.

footer.description: Advanced software engineering for companies seeking scalability.

contactSection.title: Start your
contactSection.description: Ready to scale? Tell us your technical challenge. We will analyze your case and design the software architecture your business needs to grow without limits.

errors.required: Required fields missing or privacy not accepted.

blog.title: Engineering & Thought
blog.subtitle: We explore the technologies that power our products. From offline-first PWA architectures to cloud scalability strategies.
blog.helpText: We help companies implement these technologies.

notFound.subtitle: Page not found
notFound.description: It seems you've ventured too far into the code. The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved to another server.

vault.title: Vault
vault.description: AES-256 encryption for text and files. Zero-Knowledge, all in your browser.

seo.title: Encrypt Text and Files Online - OHCodex Vault
seo.description: Free AES-256 encryption tool in the browser. Protect your documents, photos, and videos before sending. Total privacy, no servers.

vault.subtitle: Military-grade AES-256 encryption. Zero-Knowledge - Your data never leaves your browser.
vault.alert: All processing happens in your browser using Web Crypto API. Password never sent to any server.
vault.fileAlert: Files are encrypted with the same security. Result downloads with .ohc extension
vault.encryptDesc: Drag a file here or click to select
vault.enterEncrypted: Please enter encrypted text and password
vault.selectFilePassword: Please select a file and enter password
vault.selectOhcFile: Please select an .ohc file and enter password

imageOptimizer.title: Pixel Optimizer
imageOptimizer.description: Compress, resize, watermark and convert to WebP in batches.

seo.title: Compress and Optimize Images Online (WebP, JPG) - OHCodex
seo.description: Reduce photo weight, add watermark and convert to WebP for free. Batch processing in your browser. Private and no limits.

imageOptimizer.subtitle: Compress, resize and convert images in batches. 100% in the browser.
imageOptimizer.privacyAlert: EXIF metadata automatically removed for privacy

pdfStudio.title: PDF Studio
pdfStudio.description: Merge, split, sign and compress PDFs in a professional interface.

seo.title: Online PDF Editor: Merge, Sign and Compress - OHCodex PDF Studio
seo.description: Free tool to manage PDFs. Organize pages, sign documents digitally and reduce file size. No registration and secure.

pdfStudio.subtitle: Merge, rotate and organize PDFs directly in your browser.
pdfStudio.infoAlert: This is the basic version. For advanced features like compression and signing, additional implementation is required.
pdfStudio.needTwoPdfs: Select at least 2 PDFs to merge

seo.title: JSON Formatter, CSV Converter and SQL Online - OHCodex Data Station
seo.description: Validate JSON, convert CSV to JSON, format SQL and compare code. Free, private and serverless developer tools.

dataStation.subtitle: Format, validate and convert data directly in your browser.

qrFactory.subtitle: Generate custom QR codes and barcodes professionally.
